title: Washers & Dryers, Resort-worthy pool, Yoga & Spin Room
map_address: 2045 S. Forum Drive near Sara Jane Pkwy
posting_body: Just in case you needed proof that life is good, here comes Copeland.
This new apartment community in Grand Prairie will live up to the city's reputation of happy residents with vibrant social spaces and a resort-worthy pool & spa.
(Did we mention there will be complimentary kombucha on tap in the game room?)
When staying home is in order, our fabulously appointed apartments come with all the bells and whistles.
Use the link below for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 624 Sq.
- Oversized Walk-In Closets & Additional Private Storage*
- Modern, Flat-Panel Cabinets with Under-Cabinet Lighting
- Patio Lounge with Ping Pong & BBQ Grills
Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $350, Rent $25
Comments: At Copeland, we welcome your furry friends!
We charge a $350 non- refundable pet fee per pet and $25 monthly pet rent, per pet.
All pets will require registration, photos, and records in <URL>, and an additional fee will apply.
2045 S. Forum Drive , Grand Prairie, TX, 75052
